channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Goodways drift out to sea in 'Pups Save the Floating Goodways', then in 'Pups Save the Portable Pet Wash', Mayor Humdinger steals Katie's Portable Pet Wash and causes bubble trouble! (S8, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Ryder and the Pups need to help get a surprise cake up to Jake's cabin in 'Pups Save Jake's Cake', then in 'Pups Save a Wild Ride', Alex and Daring Danny X are snowboarding right for Risky Ridge.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Mysterious lights are messing up the dancing at the firefly prom in 'The Unidentified Shiny Object', and in 'The Case of the Crying Monkey', the duo follows sounds to locate a baby monkey. (S1, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The duo must figure out why bats are suddenly sneezing in 'The Bat Cave Crisis', and then in 'The Mysterious Ant Circle', biting army ants march through a birthday picnic. (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Cat Cam: When Gabby unboxes a new camera that takes silly pictures, CatRat uses it to lead Gabby, Pandy, and the Gabby Cats on a photographic scavenger hunt around the dollhouse! (S1, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Uncle Gaston: Three baby ladybirds, Amber, Emerald and Keith have come to stay at Uncle Gaston's for the day. The baby ladybirds are exhausting! So Ben and Holly help Gaston to keep them entertained.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Plumbing: The bath tap at the Little Castle is dripping, so the elf plumber is called. It's a bigger job than first expected, but with King and Queen Marigolds coming round, there's not much time.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Ice Cream; Detective Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mandy Mouse; The Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Electric Car; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Motorbiking; Breakfast Club: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Emmy and Eddie take a joyride in 'Pups Save the Wacky Water Skiers', then in 'Pups Save the Mayor's Assistant', Daring Danny X becomes Mayor Humdinger's assistant, and builds a theme park! (S10, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Competition: Today is the grown-ups' singing competition at the theatre and the kids are the judges. The children jump up and down and sing along. Everybody loves singing! (S7, ep 37).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan: Peppa and her family are on a caravan adventure and the first stop is The Biggest Potato in the World. When it starts to get foggy, they park up before another busy day. (S7, ep 25).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Larenzo Lion; Dinosaurs Alive!: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Cushion Den: On a cold day, Daddy Pig suggests they build a den until Mummy Pig has finished work. After a hard day's work, the cushion den is a perfect place to watch TV together.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Being Babies: Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit pretend to be babies to get Mummy Rabbit's attention. Mummy Rabbit plays along until they admit they are not really babies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Staying Up Late; New TV: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Indoor Adventure; Hot Dry Day: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Folk Music Band: Peppa and George are in Granny and Grandpa Pig's Garden. Granny's friends are playing folk music! They play music for Grandpa Pig and then Grandpa Pig makes apple juice for everyone.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Cat's Cafe: Peppa is on a play date with Candy Cat at Mr Cat's Cafe. Candy show Mr Cat the drawings they've done of everyone, and he hangs them up for everyone to see.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes to the Vet: Ben Elf and his parents are going on holiday in the elf truck but Gaston the Ladybird has swallowed the car keys.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Dolly Plum: Ben, Holly and Gaston the Ladybird find a large egg in the meadow.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy and Poppy: Holly and her friends must stay in the courtyard and play with Holly's little twin sisters Daisy and Poppy. All is fine until the twins borrow a magic wand and escape from the castle.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Tadpoles: Holly takes some frogspawn home from class to look after, but is surprised when the frogspawn turns into tadpoles overnight. Soon there are lots of little frogs for Holly to look after.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Playing Pretend: When Peppa's bike gets a flat tyre and needs fixing, Peppa and her friends have fun riding their imaginary bikes and jumping in pretend muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Scooters: Daddy Pig takes Peppa and George to school on their scooters. He decides it would be faster to ride back and he discovers riding scooters is such fun. He shows Mummy Pig how fun it is.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Move To Music: Madame Gazelle is getting Peppa and her playgroup friends to dance to all different styles of music.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: London: Madame Gazelle takes the whole class to London for the day and get a tour by The Queen herself.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Adventure Caravan; Caravan Friends; Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party; Broken Party Bus; Living Above the Shops; Roof Top Garden; Moving In; Everybody Sleepover!: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington must keep his promise to not make a mess in 'Paddington's Goo Monster', then in 'Paddington's Apple Pip Adventure', Paddington and Simi go on a journey into the human body. (S3, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Mr Curry is sure there's a monster in the park lake in 'Paddington and the Lake Monster', and in 'Paddington's Space Radio', Toq wants to let her dad know she's thinking of him up in space. (S3, ep 2).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington helps Mateo dress up in 'Paddington and the Three Musketeers', then in 'Paddington and the Dinosaur Hunt', Paddington, Simi and Jonathan are on a dinosaur hunt in the park. (S3, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Things go missing in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington's Journey into a Black Hole', then in 'Paddington's Rainbow Race!', Simi and Paddington try to find the gold at the end of rainbow. (S3, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Hot Dry Day; Folk Music Band; Calling Kylie; House Rules; Big Announcement; Grandpa's Robot; Paper Games; Clouds: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Cat Burglar: It's Pie Swap Day! Humdinger sends Rocky Kitty to take one of Mr. Porter's tasty pies, so he can join the contest.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Bookmobile: When Ms. Marjorie brings her bookmobile to Everest and the kids of the mountains, Maynard accidentally sets the van rolling and goes off on a wild ride.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: A superfood cake creates some super heroes in 'Paddington's Hero Squad', then in 'Paddington's Knightly Quest', Paddington wants to become a Knight; but needs to complete heroic quests! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Windsor Gardens has two new heroes in 'Paddington the Rare Bear and Mr.Brilliant', then in 'Paddington and the Accidental Hero', Jonathan is hailed a hero after saving a rare gnome. (S3, ep 14).

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Detective Potato; The Electric Car: Two episodes.

channel.desc: Fire Station Practice; Mr. Bull The Teacher: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Poems: Madame Gazelle introduces the playgroup to the wonderful world of poetry - and the wonderful world of wooly socks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: Meet Issy and her water-loving chocolate Labrador, Mo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! When a group of baby ducklings waddles away from their mummy, it's up to Issy and Mo to bring them back safe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help fix their friend's running shoes in 'Run Cynthia Run', then in 'Dora In Space', Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart! (S3, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots want to be big, but becomes way too big in 'Big Big Boots', then in 'Backpack's Sticky Situation', Backpack can't open, so Dora takes her to Abuela. (S2, ep 1).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Spyke's Splash Bash: Spyke's Splash Bash gets dangerous when Daredevil Neville appears.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Landcastle: The cadets build a massive landcastle for Spyke's farewell. (S3, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Gabby, I Shrunk the Kitties: Gabby and Pandy accidentally get turned teeny-tiny when one of Mercat's potions spills. (S2, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora helps Isa get ready for a visit from the Queen in 'Isa's Royal Garden Party', then in 'Sammy's Surprise', Dora helps Sammy the Sloth get to Day Camp. (S2, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Smurfette and Blossom take Grouchy camping in 'Unsmurfable Smile', then in 'Mind the Cat', Gargamel falls under the mind control of Azrael and the Smurfs must help to set him free. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A spilled milkshake causes a sticky situation in 'Dust Bunnies!', then in 'Mrs. Fuzzleglove!', a surprise visit from his mother forces Fuzzleglove to stoop to a new low - being a good guy! (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Kit's on the case when a prairie dog is stung in 'The Case of the Scorpion's Sting', then in 'The Case of the Constant Dripping', something's making a noise that is bothering some birds. (S1, ep 19).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora stops the Guava Geyser from erupting in 'The Floor Is Guava', then in 'We Are The Grumples', Dora travels to Troll World to find the Grumpy Old Troll (S2, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Elana and Meeka, a mixed-breed dog, as they join The Real Pup Squad! There's a big mess in the garden - plastic bottles, cardboard boxes, and all sorts of rubbish everywhere.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Masks: Madame Gazelle has got another task for the children; making masks.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Molly Mole: It is Molly Mole's first day at school and she quickly makes best friends with Peppa and Rebecca Rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: The Market: Peppa and family find some great things to buy from the market and even get a special gift from Mr. Fox's stall.

channel.desc: Father Christmas; Peppa Goes to Paris: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Spies: Nanny Plum and the Wise Old Elf compete to build a boat that will beat the Marigolds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: The Can-Do Crew: When Whiff has to leave Sodor for the day, the recycling responsibilities fall behind schedule! Thomas decides to get the Troublesome Trucks to help pick up the slack. (S27, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Pizza Picnic Problem: When Sir Topham Hatt's plans for a kazoo concert are kaput, Thomas uses creative solutions to help Sir Topham Hatt throw a pizza and pineapple cake picnic instead. (S27, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach

channel.desc: A spilled milkshake causes a sticky situation in 'Dust Bunnies!', then in 'Mrs. Fuzzleglove!', a surprise visit from his mother forces Fuzzleglove to stoop to a new low - being a good guy! (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: We Smurfed on the Moon: Leaf has a new, powerful magic wand, but doesn't know how to use it. She makes a mistake and turns off the moon! The Smurfs fly to the moon to turn it back on again. (S4, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora takes a rain cloud to a water slide in 'Partly Claudia', then in 'Ranita's Magic Stripes', Dora helps Ranita earn her magic healing stripes. (S2, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: The Pups must save Rocky and Humdinger in 'Pups Save a Box Fort', then in 'Pups Save Travelin' Travis From Really Big Bill!', Skye helps Traveling Travis search for Big Bill Island. (S8, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Cap'n Turbot's boat gets frozen in the Arctic Ice in 'Pups Save a Frozen Flounder', then in ' Pups Save a Narwhal', the pups help guide a lost narwhal back home.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The pals search for who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home in 'The Case of the Blue Bandit', then in 'The Honey Badger Break-In', Sweetie sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwell skunks help the duo find 'The Disappearing Dung Ball', then in 'The Search for the Spotted Frog', Nature ranger Wally Bunker joins Sam and Kit to look for a pet frog. (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Dollhouse Defenders: When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! (S1, ep 6).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Daisy & Poppy Go Bananas: Granny Thistle comes to visit and gives Daisy and Poppy a powerful magical wand. The children escape from the castle and. go bananas.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Mr Elf Takes a Holiday: Mr Elf is overworked so King Thistle sentences him to a holiday. He isn't too pleased. But Mrs Elf and Ben are overjoyed! Meanwhile, Nanny takes over the food deliveries.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Calling Kylie: It is bedtime and Peppa calls Kylie Kangaroo and is surprised to learn it's not morning or winter where she is! Daddy Pig explains this using a big ball to represent the earth.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: House Rules: While visiting Suzy and Emily's house, Peppa is surprised there are extra rules she doesn't have in her own house like no shoes indoors and no eating peanuts.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Big Announcement; Grandpa's Robot: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull Digs Up The River: Grandpa Pig is taking Peppa and George for a day on his boat. They see Mr. Bull, who's using his digger boat to remove all the rubbish in the river that shouldn't be there.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Paper Games: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup. Madame Gazelle is teaching the children fun games to play with paper.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's Office: Mummy and Daddy Pig are working in their home office and Peppa wants to 'work' like them too. Peppa decides that she needs her own office, so she takes the cupboard under the stairs.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clouds: Mummy, Daddy, Peppa and George are going to the seaside. Mummy and Daddy explain clouds to Peppa and George who have a little sing and dance about clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Lost City: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find the lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Teapot: Queen Thistle has a beautiful new teapot so delicate that no one is allowed to touch it. Holly accidentally breaks the teapot and tries to fix it with Ben's help.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle's Day Off: Queen Thistle decides to take a day off, so Holly, Ben, Nanny and the King have to look after the naughty twins Daisy and Poppy for the day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Shooting Star: The Wise Old Elf fears an alien invasion after a presumed shooting star lands in the Little Kingdom.

channel.desc: Simple Science: While the playground is getting rebuilt, Daddy Pig teaches the children some simple science.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Police: Police Officer Panda and Police Officer Squirrel have come to teach Peppa and her friends all about bicycle safety.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig's Book: Mummy Pig has finally finished writing her first book and decides to take it to playgroup to read to the children with unexpected results.

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington

channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington and Robot Paddingtron enjoy being heroes in 'Paddington and Paddingtron's Heroic Day', then in 'Paddington's Heroic Non-Stop Adventure', Paddington discovers how to be calm. (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: We meet Isla and her Chihuahua, Gizmo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! Their mission? To find and rescue the lost penguins in the jungle and bring them back to safety.

channel.desc: Dora needs to find rainbow water on 'The Alebrije Adventure', then in 'Let's Get A Paleta', on a super-hot day, everyone wants paleta, but Val's paleta truck is stuck! (S1, ep 3).

channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Hungry the Seagull: Spyke befriends a seagull named Hungry, leading to chaos on Kangaroo Beach.

channel.title: The Smurfs

channel.desc: Stumpy tests the bunnies' patience in 'Awesome Guy!', and in 'Cheese Zombies!', the bunnies go toe-to-toe with Dr. Fuzzleglove when he unleashes a stinky horde of zombies on Important City. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases

channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help Dulce the Dragon in 'Learning To Fly', and in 'Queen Swiper', La Reina and Swiper's bodies are switched by Big Red Chicken's magic. Dora and Boots help them switch back! (S3, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Lexi, Levi, and Will, a friendly German Shepherd, as they embark on a rescue mission to find a lost bag of dog treats hidden somewhere in the garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr. Bull's New Road: Peppa takes Goldie the Goldfish for a visit to the vets and is surprised when she finds that there's a new road to be built over the building.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Caves: The family has all gone to the caves for a day out and Grampy Rabbit is their tour guide.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George's New Clothes: George, Peppa and Mummy Pig head off to Miss Rabbit's clothes shop to get George some brand new clothes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle's House; Long Train Journey: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Suzy Goes Away; Tiny Land: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Elf Band: Snobby King and Queen Marigold are coming to visit the Little Kingdom, and Holly and her Mummy and Daddy enlist the Elf Band to impress them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Hard Times: Unable to pay the elves, King Thistle has to go to work to earn a coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly's Magic Wand: Holly needs her wand to do magic. But one day Holly loses her wand and is very sad. Ben uses his elf skills to find it again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Springtime: Springtime in the Little Kingdom brings out tulips, daffodils, hedgehogs. and two very hungry gnomes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is a rainy day but Peppa doesn't mind - her garden is full of lovely 'Muddy Puddles'. Then in 'Mr Dinosaur is Lost', George is upset when he loses his favourite toy, Mr Dinosaur.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa loves playing doctors and nurses with her 'Best Friend' Suzy Sheep, and George loves being the patient! Then in 'Polly Parrot', Granny and Grandpa Pig have a noisy new pet called Polly.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: George isn't very good at 'Hide and Seek' until Daddy Pig helps him to find somewhere to hide. Then in 'The Playgroup', it is George's first day at Peppa's playgroup. He paints a very good picture.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George love helping Mummy Pig do proper work on her computer in 'Mummy Pig at Work', while in 'Piggy in the Middle', Peppa and George play a game - with a little help from Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Travels with Terence: Terence breaks his tyre tread, Thomas takes him to get fixed and explore some of the island. But Terence's off-track energy isn't quite fit for more orderly places. (S27, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Thomas & Friends
channel.desc: Crab Crossing: While repairing a sea wall, Sandy and Carly accidentally cut off a consortium of crabs from shore! When the crabs wreak havoc the duo must redirect them to the water. (S27, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Koala Kraken: Frizzy and Pounce investigate a mysterious sea monster sighting. (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Dive Quest: The cadets go on an underwater orienteering adventure with ocean bingo. (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: Stumpy tests the bunnies' patience in 'Awesome Guy!', and in 'Cheese Zombies!', the bunnies go toe-to-toe with Dr. Fuzzleglove when he unleashes a stinky horde of zombies on Important City. (S1, ep 3).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Papa Smurf accidentally gives Baby Smurf a growth potion in 'Big Baby', then in 'Don't Smurf a Sound', Gargamel gives Azrael supersonic ears and suddenly, the Smurfs can't make a noise. (S4, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Farmer Al's harvest machine goes haywire in 'Pups Stop a Super Shaker', then in 'Pups Save a Flying Farmhouse', Farmer Al has a wild dream that his animals start acting like humans. (S8, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Francois and a baby penguin get caught on the other side of a carvasse in 'Pups Save Francois the Penguin', then in 'Pups Save Daring Danny's Hippo', Daring Danny wants a pet, and finds a baby hippo.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: A silver ant is swept up by a sandstorm in 'The Search for the Silver Ant Hill', then in 'The Search for the Swamp Snapper', Sam and Kit visit the swamp to investigate a dinosaur sighting. (S1, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: Indie helps the pals rehome a lost bee in 'The Hunt for the Hidden Hive', then in 'The Trouble of the Toppled Trees', Sam and Kit try to uncover who has been chewing the forest trees. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Kitty Fairy's Sleepover: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover. (S1, ep 13).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Honey Bees: Ben and Holly visit the bee hive to see how honey is made. Wise Old Elf is the bee keeper and he proceeds to show the children his special way of collecting honey.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Pirate Treasure: When Captain Squid leaves his treasure map in the Little Kingdom, Redbeard the Elf Pirate leads Ben, Holly and Nanny Plum on a treasure hunt.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jukebox; Undersea Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Parking Ticket; Police Boat: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bug Hotel; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Has A Cough; Mr. Potato's Fruit & Vegetable Quiz: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Alex sets up his own mini-Patrol with Chickaletta, Cali, Turtle, and Bunny in 'Pups Save Alex's Mini-Patrol', then in 'Pups Save a Lost Tooth', Alex loses his first tooth, but misplaces it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Little Swift: Peppa and her family take a poorly swift to the vet's. After a night of rest, the swift recovers and Doctor Hamster releases it so it can fly around the world again.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: What Babies Do: Peppa and her family are visiting Cousin Chloe's House to play with Baby Alexander. Peppa learns babies are not like dolls at all, and do lots of things every day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lenses; Igloo: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Wedding Day: It's the day of Mrs Cow and Mr Bull's wedding! Not everything goes to plan, but that doesn't stop it being the best wedding ever, and there is a lot of happy crying! (S7, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mr Bull is Getting Married: Peppa and her friends are at playgroup when everyone finds out that Mr Bull and Mrs Cow are going to get married the next day! (S7, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Party Bus; Movie Night: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Art House Day; Wildflower Wood: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Sunny Day Games: Peppa and George are playing at their grandparent's garden on a very hot day but they don't have a paddling pool! (S7, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Getting Ready for a Wedding: Everyone is getting ready for Mr Bull and Mrs Cow's wedding, going to the jewellers to get rings, to the dress makers. and to sort out the wedding cake! (S7, ep 15).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Zoo: Madame Gazelle takes the children on a trip to the Zoo where they get a tour from the zookeepers; Mr Lion, Mrs Crocodile and Mr Giraffe.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Outback: The Pig family visit the Kangaroo family in Australia! On their first day they fly into the outback in Mr Kangaroo's aeroplane, have a barbeque and play some cricket with a Koala.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Surfing: On their second day in Australia the Kangaroo family take the Pig family to the beach where they try out surfing. George shows off his skills when he's out paddling with Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Great Barrier Reef: Today the family go to work with Mrs Kangaroo on the Great Barrier Reef. While taking in the beautiful views in Mrs Kangaroo's submarine, they find some special treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Granny Sheep Moves In; Cardboard Boxes; Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Clubhouse Takeaway; Walkie Talkies; Peppa's Office; Little Swift; What Babies Do; Lenses: Six episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington learns that seagulls love chips in 'Paddington vs the Seagulls', and in 'Paddington and the Light House', the lighthouse light is broken - can Paddington help save a boat at sea? (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks Captain Green Beard's loot in 'Paddington's Pirate Treasure Hunt', then in 'Paddington's Sandcastle Showstopper', everyone is keen to win the sandcastle competition! (S3, ep 10).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Some pufflings get lost in 'Paddington's Puffling Rescue', then in 'Paddington Goes Under The Sea', Paddington enjoys a diving adventure with Jonathan and Judy - but where is her necklace? (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: The beach is a mess until 'Paddington's Beach Clean Up', then in 'Paddington's Holiday Farewell', the summer holidays have come to an end, so it's time to say goodbye to their new friends. (S3, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Lenses; Igloo; Mr Bull is Getting Married; Getting Ready for a Wedding; Wedding Day; Party Bus; Movie Night; Art House Day: Eight episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups Save a Popped Top: The top of Farmer's Al's silo has been knocked off, and he needs help saving his corn crop.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Paw Patrol
channel.desc: Pups and the Mystery of the Driverless Snow Cat: Daring Danny's new remote control accidentally takes control of Everest's Snow Cat and all the vehicles in Adventure Bay.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: Paddington seeks the mystery hero doing good deeds in Windsor Gardens in 'Paddington and the Unlikely Hero', then in 'Paddington Needs a Hero', Paddington gets stuck in an igloo! (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Adventures of Paddington
channel.desc: There's a special photo wall in the park in 'Paddington's Favourite Hero', then in 'Paddington And The Skateboarder', Mateo helps Paddington to become a heroic skateboarder. (S3, ep 18).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Walking Bus; Happily Ever After: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Singing Lesson; Singing Competition: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Three Challenges: In the jungle, the Brave Bunnies' tiger friend Garry invites them to play a game that tests their bravery, balance and brains. (S1, ep 47).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: Let's Roar: Brave Bop and Boo set off to explore the Savannah, when a lion cub, Louis, leaps out with a ROAR! (S1, ep 39).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Brave Bunnies
channel.desc: An Extraordinary Tail: The Brave Bunnies stop in a jungle to collect seeds for their garden. Bop and Boo meet Percy, a proud peacock who can't resist boasting about his extraordinary tail. (S1, ep 41).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora gets a new puppy that makes her cat Lucky jealous in 'A Dog For Dora', then in 'Super Pozole', today is the championship game, but all of Dora's friends have a cold. (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora recovers a ring for a crab wedding in 'Crabby Wedding', then in 'The Cloud Kingdom', Dora travels to the Cloud Kingdom with Vicky the Vicuna. (S2, ep 5).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Dad Rescue: Frizzy leads a rescue mission when her dad gets into trouble in the mountains. (S3, ep 11).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Kangaroo Beach
channel.desc: Koala Kraken: Frizzy and Pounce investigate a mysterious sea monster sighting. (S3, ep 9).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: Charm Bracelet Treasure Hunt: Gabby unboxes a charm bracelet that has a tiny bottle charm with a treasure map inside! Following the clues on the map, we find more charms for the bracelet. (S3, ep 17).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel convinces Dimwitty and Begonia that he is nice in 'Crashing Gargamel's Party', then in 'The Curse of the Smurfs' Treasure', Farmer and Vanity unearth an unlucky magical chest! (S1, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Super Duper Bunny League
channel.desc: A bad haircut threatens to ruin more than just Steve's good looks in 'Bad Hair Day!', then in 'Kanga Ruiner!', the team travels to Australia to stop a giant Mecha-Roo. (S1, ep 4).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The Stinkwells send Sam and Kit a strange case in 'The Frozen Stowaways', then in 'The Puzzle of the Empty Pond', a salamander mom wonders why her dry pond hasn't filled up with water. (S1, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora shows the twins a baila folklorico dancer who comes to life in 'Tiny Dancer', then in 'The Sleepy Sun', the sun won't set because it can't fall asleep! Dora needs to find Pillow Cloud. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Real Pup Squad
channel.desc: We meet Ella and her British Bulldog, Pablo, as they join The Real Pup Squad! A wall has fallen down, leaving toy bricks scattered everywhere.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Daddy Loses His Glasses: When Daddy Pig loses his glasses he gets a bit grumpy. But Peppa and George have lots of fun looking for them.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Gardening: Peppa and George enjoy helping Grandpa Pig plant seeds in his garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Bicycles: Daddy Pig teaches Peppa to ride her bicycle without stabilisers - just like her friends.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Pig gives Peppa a special box to store secret things, in 'Secrets', and then in 'Flying a Kite', Peppa, George and Daddy Pig discover that it's not very easy to fly a kite on a windy day.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George feed bread to the ducks and Daddy Pig is chased by a wasp in 'Picnic', then in 'Musical Instruments', Peppa, Mummy and Daddy all find an instrument to play. But what about George.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Gaston Goes To School: Naughty Gaston is sent to pet school, where Miss Jolly soon gets him into shape.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Royal Picnic: Holly invites Ben on the annual Royal Fairy Picnic. King Thistle hopes there won't be a repeat of last year's magical jelly flood.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Ant Farm: Things are going missing all over the Little Kingdom - Holly has lost her wand and Ben has lost his horn! Soon they realise that ants are stealing their things.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Elf Rescue: With so many rescue missions, Elf Rescue needs a helping hand from Children Rescue.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George play at being different creatures in 'Frogs and Worms and Butterflies', and then in 'Dressing Up', Peppa and George make everyone laugh when they dress up as Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa gets shiny new red shoes and never, ever wants to take them off in 'New Shoes', and then in 'The School Fete', Peppa loves the school fete. There's so much to do.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa, George and Daddy Pig prepare a wonderful birthday surprise for 'Mummy Pig's Birthday', and then in 'The Tooth Fairy', Peppa is surprised to find her lost tooth is replaced by a shiny coin.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa's family car breaks down, so while it is being mended they borrow another one in 'The New Car', and then in 'Treasure Hunt', Granny and Grandpa Pig bury treasure in their garden.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Frog Prince: Holly accidentally turns Ben into a frog. With the help of her friends, Holly tries to turn Ben back into an elf but instead turns him into a bird and then a rabbit.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Lucy's Elf and Fairy Party: Lucy celebrates her birthday with an Elf and Fairy party and Ben, Holly and friends are invited.

channel.desc: Gaston To The Rescue: Out looking for Gaston, after banning him from the castle, the elves and fairies come across a speaking door which leads to the dwarf mine. Once in, they find they can't get out.

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The King's Busy Day: Holly spends the day with King Thistle on his royal duties. King Thistle must launch an elf boat, judge a fairy fruit competition and make a speech at the festival.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Monkey Trees; Canoe Trip: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The Holiday; Water Park: Two episodes.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Dinosaur Party!; Superhero Party: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: A Day With Doctor Hamster; Playgroup Garden: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nature Class: Nanny Plum takes the Fairy children for a nature class in the woods, and bumps into the Wise Old Elf who is teaching a nature class to the Elf children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups help make a giant pizza in 'The Crew Builds A Pizza Parlor', then in 'The Crew Builds An Airport Road', the crew fixes Speed Meister's wonky road. (S2, ep 14).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Creature Cases
channel.desc: The pals search for who nabbed a crab's spiral shell home in 'The Case of the Blue Bandit', then in 'The Honey Badger Break-In', Sweetie sneaks onto Sam and Kit's bee-infested aircraft. (S1, ep 8).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Boots gets Tico a Guayabera shirt in 'A Guayabera For Tico', then in 'Falling Estrella's', Dora returns three missing stars to their constellation. (S1, ep 12).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: The Mermaid Cruise Ship: All aboard the S.S. MerCat! It's time to go on a mermaid-tastic cruise with Gabby and Pandy, as they cruise to Mermaid Cove, where they see a special show! (S3, ep 16).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa is feeling unwell and Doctor Brown Bear says she must stay in bed in 'Not Very Well', then in 'Windy Castle', Peppa and her family visit Windy Castle, where the view is fantastic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: My Cousin Chloe; Babysitting: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Granny and Granpapa: A magical card arrives in the Little Kingdom, inviting everyone to a party at Granny and Granpapa Thistle's castle in the clouds.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: The Queen Bakes Cakes: A cake sale is organised to mend the magic school, but Queen Thistle is baking and no-one can eat her cakes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Redbeard's Rainbow: Rainbows are a pirate's best friend - if you're looking for a pot of gold. But, if like Captain Squid you are hiding treasure, then rainbows are a pirate's worst enemy.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fox Cubs: There is a new fox cub leader in The Little Kingdom - Nanny Plum. But whilst trying to earn their adventure badges the fox cubs find themselves stuck at the top of a mountain.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Tiny Chef Show
channel.desc: Chef makes a homemade recipe in 'Ice Cream', then in 'Pasta & Sauce', Chef makes Brody Bambino's pasta sauce recipe. (S2, ep 7).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Mayor Humdinger becomes HumCatDingerMan in 'Pups and Cats Save HumCatDingerMan', then in 'Pups Save A Turbot Tournament', the pups must save Tilly during the Turbot Tournament. (S10, ep 21).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Magic Trick: Mummy Elephant invites Peppa and Daddy Pig to perform magic at Emily's birthday party, and Peppa shows her friends how the magic trick works. (S7, ep 22).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Jumping Stick: Daddy Pig receives a jumping stick and tries to show how to use it, but finds it difficult. Peppa and her friends struggle too. But there's always jumping in muddy puddles! (S7, ep 23).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Racquet Games; Caravan Friends: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Living Above the Shops: Peppa is playing with Freddy Fox at his home, in an apartment above the shops. Peggi and Pandora Panda, and Candy Cat live there too, and help show Peppa around. (S7, ep 30).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Chloe's Birthday Party: At Chloe's party, the children and grownups struggle to finish the obstacle course to reach the prize. George is the last to try and finds the birthday cake! (S7, ep 27).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Roof Top Garden; Moving In: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Everybody Sleepover!; Walking Bus: Two episodes.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Happily Ever After: At the playgroup, Madame Gazelle is reading a story, but a page is missing so she makes up an ending. During playtime, the children make up their own endings too! (S7, ep 35).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Broken Party Bus: Miss Rabbit arrives with the broken bus. This is a job for Grampy Rabbit! Once fixed, Mummy Rabbit and Rebecca Rabbit arrive with a cake for Grampy Rabbit's birthday! (S7, ep 28).

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Nature Class: Nanny Plum takes the Fairy children for a nature class in the woods, and bumps into the Wise Old Elf who is teaching a nature class to the Elf children.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Miss Cookie's Nature Trail: Miss Cookie's class is out on a nature trail, in the Little Kingdom! It is up to Ben and Holly to prevent the elves and fairies being discovered.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Fun and Games: Ben and Holly are having fun playing in the meadow. Holly gets frustrated when Ben uses his elf skills to win all the games. Ben gets frustrated when Holly uses her magic skills.
